name: Inevitable (Indie Bullet)
description:
This is my submission for the 48 hour 

GMTK Game Jam 2019.

Eventhough I wasn't able to use the full time window, infact I wasn't able to use even half of it, I tryed to make the most of the little amount of time I had to my disposal and participate anyway.

Trying to match the Jams topic ONLY ONE was no easy task for me (my secound game Jam so far and my first one with a closer theme), still I had fun doing so.

The game has:

  •  ONLY ONE Player
  • ONLY ONE Enemy
  • ONLY ONE Screen
  • ONLY ONE Shield

Have fun playing .

Critique and feedback is greatly appreciated.
